name: Invite user with organization to organization via UI
description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Signup second user.
- Pass onboarding for second user and create organization via UI.

### Verify that:

- User can invite to organization another user that already has organization.'
descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials.
  • Create new organization via API.
  • Signup second user.
  • Pass onboarding for second user and create organization via UI.

Verify that:

  • User can invite to organization another user that already has organization.'

testStage.description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Signup second user.
- Pass onboarding for second user and create organization via UI.

### Verify that:

- User can invite to organization another user that already has organization.'
testStage.descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials.
  • Create new organization via API.
  • Signup second user.
  • Pass onboarding for second user and create organization via UI.

Verify that:

  • User can invite to organization another user that already has organization.'
